name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 2024-2025
summary:
The "Professional Baseball Spirits" series is a professional baseball game that pursues realism.

The first home game, ``Professional Baseball Spirits 2004,'' was released on March 25, 2004. "Professional Baseball Spirits 2015" introduces 3D scanning technology that photographs professional baseball players from 360 degrees and reproduces them three-dimensionally.

Furthermore, we have also adopted laser scanning technology that measures the precise shape of the stadium, allowing you to enjoy a realistic baseball experience with overwhelming expressiveness.

videos.name: Teaser
videos.title: 『プロ野球スピリッツ2024-2025』ティザートレーラー
